scripts.build:dev: cpx node_modules/openfl/dist/openfl.min.js bin/js-debug && cpx node_modules/starling-framework/dist/starling.min.js bin/js-debug && cpx node_modules/openfl/dist/howler.min.js bin/js-debug && asconfigc --debug=true
scripts.build:prod: cpx node_modules/openfl/dist/openfl.min.js bin/js-release && cpx node_modules/starling-framework/dist/starling.min.js bin/js-release && cpx node_modules/openfl/dist/howler.min.js bin/js-release && asconfigc --debug=false
